data.name: Hypnotix
data.detailed_description:
What is Hypnotix?

Hypnotix is a guided meditation mindfulness app which will take you on a different journey every time you click 'Start'.

This app is not for the faint of heart, as you will need to completely let go and prepare to be taken to unknown places within your mind . . .

Featuring:

* Algorithms that put together a different meditation journey each time, by chaining different sound files into varying combinations.
* Hundreds of meditation sound files.
* Mystery lockboxes and other awards to unlock, as a reward for time spent in meditation.

What is the aim of this app?

The focus is on you 100%. My aim is to help you unwind, relax, and take you on many exotic, unpredictable, mysterious and fun journeys.

How is this app different to most other meditation apps?

The guided meditations are put together using algorithms which build a different relaxing experience every time, using hundreds of different sound files. The guided meditations are almost hypnotic. Hypnotix is a sister app to 'Boot Camp Fitness' but focusing on mindfulness and relaxation rather than physical health and exercise.

This is not your standard, hit the spacebar and time your mediations app.

Can I control the journey in any way?

No, you will have no control whatsoever, which gives Hypnotix its appeal. There are some player settings where you can turn on or off suggestions for healthy eating, regular exercise, stress management, confidence building etc, but beyond that you will have no control. However, despite being unorthodox and unpredictable Hypnotix only takes you to positive places.

The development road map

The aim is to add more and more mystery journey meditation sound files to expand the game further and further. With many journeys shaped and influenced by players.

Please note before downloading

When using Hypnotix, please find a safe space where you can close your eyes, either by lying down or sitting comfortably. Do not use this app when driving, using heavy machinery or any other activity that requires waking attention.

data.legal_notice:
Do not watch or listen to the material in Hypnotix if your are driving, operating machinery or have any underlying mental health issues. Only listen to the guided meditations where it is safe for you to close your eyes, relax and fall asleep.
It is advised that players try the example guided meditations on the store page before purchasing this app.
All content within Hypnotix by Kevin Baker is intended for entertainment, relaxation and educational purposes only and must be regarded as such. None of the material within Hypnotix is intended to offer or replace health or medical related advice. The developer does not claim to be a professional in guided meditations or hypnosis, despite striving to do thorough research and follow the advice of professionals in the field of guided meditation.
The developer accepts no responsibility or liability whatsoever for any injury, loss or damage in any shape or form incurred in part or in whole, as a direct or indirect result of using the Hypnotix app and all visual or audio material within the app.
